name: Closers: Super Sale Pack
detailed_description:
Ready to delve even deeper into the world of Closers? This pack contains gear, elite status, costumes, and more! (The Super Sale Pack is limited to one per account.)

The Super Sale Pack contains:

  • Visual slot unlock for all accessory costume pieces—Get the accessory stats you want, with the look you love!
  • Panda Pajama Costume Box—So comfortable, you’ll want to spend your whole winter napping in them.
  • 15-Day Elite Status Voucher—Get the most out of Closers with half a month of elite status.
  • 55 Resurrection Capsules—You get knocked down, but you get up again…55 times!
  • 1 Hyper-Clocked Equalizer—Tune that high-level gear until it begs for mercy!

short_description: The Premium Starter Pack contains key items for diving right into the world of Closers, including:Visual slot unlock for all accessory costume piecesPanda Pajama Costume Box15-Day Elite Status Voucher55 Resurrection Capsules(Limit 1 per account)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel/AMD Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 8000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
